Description: Painted wooden shabti of Tay... with a black and yellow gala-wig, a carved face with black features, a blue and yellow collar, crossed arms in relief, the legs are inscribed with nine rows of yellow painted Hieroglyphs(very worn) separated by yellow lines, the back is inscribed with a single column of painted hieroglyphs, the whole figure is thickly varnished, the foot is damaged.
